name: Blindia
description: Blindia is an abstract top-down shooter puzzle game where you have to go through the difficulties using sound. Use the visualized sound waves to take down the enemies and make your way to the exit. At the end, you will face the truth of this blind world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2000 Series(1.6 GHz) or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600GT or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
